Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Houston in 2009...
Injured on 5/8/2009 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Houston to Pittsburgh on 5/30/2009 (Going to HOU: P S. Linebrink, P T. Lilly. Going to PIT: 1B A. Dykstra, SS E. Andrus, P K. Millwood)...
Injured on 5/25/2012 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Seattle on 7/8/2012 (Going to SEA: SS E. Andrus. Going to PIT: 1B S. Casey)...
Had first career hit on 4/10/2016, off Pat Neshek (NYA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/30/2016, off Alexis Mazur (CHA)...
Traded from Seattle to Milwaukee on 2/4/2018 (Going to MIL: 2B E. Andrus, P J. Petty Jr., 1B F. Moore Jr.. Going to SEA: CF T. Wheeler)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Houston on 5/5/2019...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Los Angeles (N) on 7/31/2019...
Injured on 9/30/2022 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
